name: Dachis Group - Twitter follow button for WordPress
body:
This plugin creates a widget for use with [WordPress](http://wordpress.org) and can be used to easily add Twitter follow button and sidebar widget. It aims to make the Twitter follow button configurable via the WordPress administration system.

In addition to the widget you can use the [shortcode](http://codex.wordpress.org/Shortcode_API) 

Short code example:

`[twitter-follow screen_name="dachisgroup_eu" show_count="yes"]`


Available options:
* _screen_name_ = the twitter screen name **Required**
* _show_screen_name_ = yes or no
* _show_count_ = yes or no
* _button_size_ = medium or large
* _width_ = no default
* _align_ = left or right
* _custom_styling_ = yes or no
* _language_ = 2 letter language code, default en

More information on the Twitter follow buttons can be found at: https://dev.twitter.com/docs/follow-button


## Installation

You can install the plugin using the following steps:

1. Download the plugin direct from the Plugin Page at WordPress.
2. Upload the whole plugin folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ folder.
3. Go to the Plugins page and activate the plugin
4. Add the widget or shortcode
tagline: Shows the twitter follow links and buttons. This is a simple plugin to make the follow button configurable via the WordPress administration system
